name: elbdop
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, cbo), wa(wcel(c0, clo), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))

stmt.origin: elrab2(hs0, c0, cbo, clo, wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf), wbr(cfv(cnop, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf))
stmt.pretty: elrab2(hs0, c0, cbo, clo, (normop ` c0)[<]+∞, (normop ` hs0)[<]+∞)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cbo), wa(wcel(c0, clo), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wbr(cfv(cnop, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))
-| wceq(cbo, crab(hs0, clo, wbr(cfv(cnop, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, clo)
-| diffsw(hs0, wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ BndLinOp ↔(c0 ∈ LinOp ∧(normop ` c0)[<]+∞))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((normop ` hs0)[<]+∞ ↔(normop ` c0)[<]+∞))
⊣ BndLinOp = { hs0 ∈ LinOp |(normop ` hs0)[<]+∞ }
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, LinOp)
⊣ d(hs0,(normop ` c0)[<]+∞)

stmt.origin: breq1d(cfv(cnop, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf, cfv(cnop, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
stmt.pretty: breq1d((normop ` hs0), clt, cpnf, (normop ` c0), hs0 = c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wbr(cfv(cnop, cv(hs0)), clt, cpnf), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cnop, cv(hs0)), cfv(cnop, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 = c0 →((normop ` hs0)[<]+∞ ↔(normop ` c0)[<]+∞))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →(normop ` hs0)=(normop ` c0))
